messages.content: What is current speed of wind?

function.name: get_current_temperature
function.description: Get the current temperature at a location.

location.description: The location to get the temperature for, in the format "City, Country"

unit.description: The unit to return the temperature in.

return.description: The current temperature at the specified location in the specified units, as a float.

function.name: get_current_wind_speed
function.description: Get the current wind speed in km/h at a given location.

location.description: The location to get the temperature for, in the format "City, Country"

return.description: The current wind speed at the given location in km/h, as a float.
